mapper.select: SELECT p.product_num, p.title, p.description, p.price, p.image, p.like, p.review, s.second_type_id, s.second_type_title, f.first_type_id, f.first_type_title FROM product p JOIN second_type s ON p.second_type_id = s.second_type_id JOIN first_type f ON s.first_type_id = f.first_type_id ORDER BY s.second_type_title;
